ED A 321F.title: Secondary Visual Art Methods
ED A 321F.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED A 321F.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design,  research, and theory related to teaching and learning visual arts at the secondary level.

ED A 321M.title: Secondary Visual Arts Methods
ED A 321M.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED A 321M.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design,  research, and theory related to teaching and learning visual arts at the secondary level.

ED A 341.title: Student Teaching: Visual Arts Secondary
ED A 341.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED A 341.description: Supervised fieldwork in secondary Visual Arts classrooms (grades 7-12).

ED A 371.title: Professional Issues in Teaching Visual Art: Secondary
ED A 371.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED A 371.description: Seminar in which secondary teacher candidates in visual art share and  discuss their field experience, explore further avenues of teaching    content, and investigate more effective ways of engaging and supporting  students.
